name: Brandfolder Advanced Search
description: Create your own instance of an app to use the Advanced Search API to generate a view of assets.

BF_API_KEY.description: (optional) A Brandfolder API key to override the user option.

BF_URLS.description: (optional) A list of comma-separated Brandfolder URLs to override the user option.

LOCKUP_CODEWORD.description: (optional) A password required before searching (recommended if BF_API_KEY is set).
